class.name: VideoStreamPlayer
class.brief_description: A control used for video playback.
class.description: A control used for playback of [VideoStream] resources. Supported video formats are [url=https://www.theora.org/]Ogg Theora[/url] ([code].ogv[/code], [VideoStreamTheora]) and any format exposed via a GDExtension plugin. [b]Warning:[/b] On Web, video playback [i]will[/i] perform poorly due to missing architecture-specific assembly optimizations.

method.name: get_stream_length
method.description: The length of the current stream, in seconds. [b]Note:[/b] For [VideoStreamTheora] streams (the built-in format supported by Godot), this value will always be zero, as getting the stream length is not implemented yet. The feature may be supported by video formats implemented by a GDExtension add-on.

method.name: get_stream_name
method.description: Returns the video stream's name, or [code]"<No Stream>"[/code] if no video stream is assigned.

method.name: get_video_texture
method.description: Returns the current frame as a [Texture2D].

method.name: is_playing
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the video is playing. [b]Note:[/b] The video is still considered playing if paused during playback.

method.name: play
method.description: Starts the video playback from the beginning. If the video is paused, this will not unpause the video.

method.name: stop
method.description: Stops the video playback and sets the stream position to 0. [b]Note:[/b] Although the stream position will be set to 0, the first frame of the video stream won't become the current frame.
